description: Defination of term node. All members are protected, to keep rigorism of data struct.

params.name: term
params.description: term, common name of this term.

params.name: base
params.description: cb indicates concept base, eb indicates entity base.

params.name: term_type
params.description: type of this term, constructs hirechical of term node. Defaults to None.

params.name: hyper
params.description: parent type of a type node. Defaults to None.

params.name: node_type
params.description: type statement of node, type or term. Defaults to term.

params.name: alias
params.description: alias of this term. Defaults to None.

params.name: alias_ext
params.description: extended alias of this term, CANNOT be used in matching.Defaults to None.

params.name: sub_type
params.description: grouped by some term. Defaults to None.

params.name: sub_term
params.description: some lower term. Defaults to None.

params.name: data
params.description: to sore full imformation of a term. Defaults to None.
